/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -g --generate-code=arch=compute_52,code=[compute_52,sm_52] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/orbiterv6.dir/NbKernel_N2.cu.o CMakeFiles/orbiterv6.dir/NbodyRenderer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/orbiterv6.dir/NbSystemCUDA.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/orbiterv6.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lglfw -lGLU -lGL -lglut -lGLEW -lgsl -lgslcblas -lm -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
